channel.title: Making a server-CMD command help
channel.description:
when i go to the CMD thing under run in start and type in ipconfig it says...
ipconfig is not a recognized as a internal or external command inoperable program or batch file
any help would be highly appreciated

item.title: Making a server-CMD command help
item.dc:creator: @bobthecat bobthecat
item.description:
@bobthecat wrote:

umm no? you can’t change it back… i asked my aunt and she is a computer technician person. she said she did the same thing and changed the path back to exactly what is was and it still didnt work she had to wipe her hard drive…so did i…

Read full topic

item.title: Making a server-CMD command help
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

lol… you just change your Classpath or Path back?

Btw i have the same problem all you have to do i open CMD from C:/WINDOWS directly and it works fine

Read full topic

item.title: Making a server-CMD command help
item.dc:creator: @bobthecat bobthecat
item.description:
@bobthecat wrote:

this happened to me, and i’m sorry to say it but, i had to wipe my hard drive.

Did you change your system CLASSPATH and PATH? if you did there’s no way to fix it, you have to wipe your hard drive.

Read full topic
